titles.title: Your love has taken over me

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Your love has taken over me
Father, I depend on you
I have confidence in you
In you oh Lord, I put my trust
Your love has taken over me
Father, I depend on you
I have confidence in you
In you oh Lord, I put my trust

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Yes you cover me
Under the canopy
Give me security
I am the righteousness of God
Yes you cover me
Under the canopy
Give me security
I am the righteousness of God
